mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER(LOGIN_ID, NAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, GENDER, MOBILE_NUMBER, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, USER_TYPE, EMAIL_CONDITION) VALUES(#{login_ID},#{name},#{password},#{email},#{gender},#{mobile_number}, sysdate, sysdate, 'A', 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT LOGIN_ID, NAME, EMAIL, GENDER, MOBILE_NUMBER, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, EMAIL_CONDITION, USER_TYPE, PASSWORD FROM TBL_USER
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER SET NAME=#{name}, PASSWORD=#{password}, MOBILE_NUMBER=#{mobile_number}, EMAIL=#{email} WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{login_ID}
UPDATE TBL_USER SET MODIFIED_DATE=sysdate WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{login_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{login_ID}
SELECT LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD FROM TBL_USER WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{login_ID} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
SELECT LOGIN_ID, PASSWORD, NAME FROM TBL_USER WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{login_ID} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
